title: 10 years special have my skin but i didnt get the icon yet
body: I got the riot kayle skin, but i checked my icons and i don't have the icon for the special. :/ {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
*Lew* is correct. We've had to send these gifts out in batches because of how many players we're sending them out to.

If by the 23rd you're still missing the icon, let me know.
Yes I haven't received my skin yet but have received my summoner's icon.
The gifts are going out one by one and you should get them all by 9/23.
